reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Knowledge and expertise sharing to develop regulatory capacity and best practice in India

description.narrative: Improve the regulatory environment in India through a series of government-to-government exchanges that leverage UK expertise to deliver sustainable reforms. This will promote economic growth and job creation in country. It will also generate opportunities for international business, bringing potential benefits to British businesses in sectors where they are best placed to compete. [Following a methodology change, from financial year 19/20 costs under this activity will be reported against a new activity line. You can find the new IATI identifier by looking up “other identifier information”.]

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
